vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.10;
son of: Sodi (H5476)
§ Gaddiel = "God is my fortune"
the spy from the tribe of Zebulun sent by Moses to spy out the land of Canaan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Sodí; espía; tribu de Zabulón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦疊 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝是我的財富"
被摩西派去窺探迦南地的西布倫支派探子(民 13:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦迭 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝是我的财富"
被摩西派去窥探迦南地的西布伦支派探子(民 13:10)
